snippet: The activities of Steven C. LaTourette, an ex-congressman who defends centrist Republicans from Tea Party challengers, have raised questions about whether he is profiting from his role and violating lobbying rules.
abstract: Activities of Steven C LaTourette, ex-congressman who defends centrist Republicans from Tea Party challengers, have raised questions about whether he is profiting from his role and violating lobbying rules; role has provided significant benefits to Main Street Partnership, corporate-backed advocacy group run by LaTourette.
lead_paragraph: The activities of Steven C. LaTourette, an ex-congressman who defends centrist Republicans from Tea Party challengers, have raised questions about whether he is profiting from his role and violating lobbying rules.

headline.main: Tangled Role in G.O.P. War Over Tea Party
headline.print_headline: Tangled Role In G.O.P. War Over Tea Party
